description:
This game is a 2 player only game set in the fifth dimension. Using your wit and grit, you must fight a second player and win the fifth dimension ninja tournament. You must fight to retain your place in the tournament, else you die.

First Player controls: WASD, B for attack
Second Player Controls: Left, Right, Up, Down, J for attack

Credits:
Ninja Sprites: DezrasDragons
Advertisements: Wendy’s
